name: TrendGuru
description: Introducing Trend Guru YOUR ULTIMATE TRENDING TECHNOLOGY. MAIN SOURCE FOR AUTHENTIC ON-CHAIN TRENDING DATA. EMPOWER YOUR TRADES WITH REAL INSIGHTS - SAY GOODBYE TO FAKE TRENDS! Are you tired of browsing through non-organic data? Look no further! Trend Guru is here to revolutionise the way you access trending data. Our mission is to provide traders and investors with real, authentic, and organic on-chain live trending data, empowering you to make informed decisions in the ever-changing world of finance. TrendGuru is the smartest trending tech-bot, the results are generated from real on-time chain data from two of the most popular chains (ETH/BSC). We will add more chains in the future accordingly to their demand and popularity. This allows investors to keep track of what’s hot in the market, what’s trending in this space. While other trending sites/bots are based on payment and fake volume, our trending is based on algorithms. Trend is your best friend when it comes to trading. Whether it’s finding the next Trend or Meta our software will give you the edge, We believe in providing value to the crypto community #SmartTrading
